::Killfest/DarkMouse/EndBringer/Demise/Greven::

Killfest frowns, looking around. He nods. "That would have been a good 
idea for them, yes."

He looks at a door as it opens. EndBringer, Demise, and Greven 
entering.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DarkMouse nods as she recieves DrillBit's transmission. "Sure thing. 
Megs is walking down around the base with Rampage, and I think the 
rest of his troops are in the engine room. Wait! Black Arachnia and 
Gremlin are out too, heading this way!"

She looks at Dollen and pulls out her gun. "Nope, but we might have 
battle here soon, be ready."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Killfest growls at DarkMouse's report. "You heard her. I'll send my 
team to take out Megatron. Get some troops to the engine room."

He nods at the three bots in the room that were under his command. 
They exit and head for Megatron's position.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "The only confirmed position is the Engine room."
> He re-opened his comm.
> "Dark Mouse, you got that info yet?"
> He then had a disturbing thought.
> "Guys, I think we've done exactly what they want. We were led to 
believe
> they were here. Now we're huddled up here in the Bridge. Their 
probably
> coming to ambush us now, and take the Bridge."
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He decided to go see if the lock down was over. He walked out, and
> nearly bumped into Feline. He quickly tried to walk away, but there 
was
> no way she could have missed him.
> 
> ::Demolition::
> 
> He continued to sit on the top hatch of the base. What was the base 
on
> lockdown. He couldn't get in, and he didn't like sitting on the 
hatch
> for a day.
> 
> ::Dollon::
> 
> He sat down next to Dark Mouse.
